55 namespace Teuchos {

58 struct UnitTestData {
59 
60  const Teuchos::UnitTestBase * unitTest;
61  std::string groupName;
62  std::string testName;
63  int insertionIndex;
64 
65  UnitTestData(
66  Teuchos::UnitTestBase *unitTest_in,
67  const std::string groupName_in,
68  const std::string testName_in
69  )
70  : unitTest(unitTest_in), groupName(groupName_in), testName(testName_in),
71  insertionIndex(insersionIndexCounter_++)
72  {
73 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
74  TEUCHOS_ASSERT(unitTest_in);
75 #endif
76  }
77 
78 private:
79  UnitTestData(); // Not defined!
80  static int insersionIndexCounter_;
81 };
82 
83 
84 int UnitTestData::insersionIndexCounter_ = 0;
85 
86 
87 bool operator<(const UnitTestData &a, const UnitTestData &b)
88 {
89  if (a.groupName < b.groupName) {
90  return true;
91  }
92  else if (a.groupName > b.groupName) {
93  return false;
94  }
95  return a.insertionIndex < b.insertionIndex;
96 }
97 
98 
99 
100 std::string getUnitTestName(const std::string groupName,
101  const std::string testName)
102 {
103  std::ostringstream oss;
104  oss << groupName<<"_"<<testName<<"_UnitTest";
105  return oss.str();
106 }

108 
109 enum EShowTestDetails {
110  SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_ALL,
111  SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_TEST_NAMES,
112  SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_FINAL_RESULTS
113 };
114 
115 
116 bool strMatch( const std::string &fullMatchStr, const std::string &str )
117 {
118 
119  const std::string::size_type npos = std::string::npos;
120 
121  const int strLen = str.length();
122  const int fullMatchStrLen = fullMatchStr.length();
123 
124  if (fullMatchStrLen == 0) {
125  return true;
126  }
127 
128  const bool beginGlob = fullMatchStr[0] == '*';
129  const bool endGlob = fullMatchStr[fullMatchStrLen-1] == '*';
130 
131  const int matchStrLen =
132  fullMatchStrLen + (beginGlob ? -1 : 0) + (endGlob ? -1 : 0);
133 
134  if (matchStrLen == 0) {
135  return true;
136  }
137 
138  if (matchStrLen > strLen) {
139  return false;
140  }
141 
142  if (beginGlob && endGlob) {
143  return str.find(fullMatchStr.substr(1, matchStrLen)) != npos;
144  }
145 
146  if (endGlob) {
147  return fullMatchStr.substr(0, matchStrLen) == str.substr(0, matchStrLen);
148  }
149 
150  if (beginGlob) {
151  return fullMatchStr.substr(1, matchStrLen) ==
152  str.substr(strLen-matchStrLen, matchStrLen);
153  }
154 
155  return fullMatchStr == str;
156 
157 }
158

171 class UnitTestRepository::InstanceData {
172 public:
173 
174  typedef Teuchos::Array<UnitTestData> unitTests_t;
175 
176  unitTests_t unitTests;
177  CommandLineProcessor clp;
178  EShowTestDetails showTestDetails;
179  bool showSrcLocation;
180  bool showFailSrcLocation;
181  bool noOp;
182  std::string groupName;
183  std::string testName;
184  std::string notUnitTestName;
185  int testCounter;
186 
187  InstanceData()
188  :clp(false),
189  showTestDetails(SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_TEST_NAMES),
190  showSrcLocation(false),
191  showFailSrcLocation(true),
192  noOp(false),
193  testCounter(0)
194  {}
195 
196 };

202 CommandLineProcessor& UnitTestRepository::getCLP()
203 {
204  return getData().clp;
205 }
206 
207 
208 bool UnitTestRepository::runUnitTests(FancyOStream &out)
209 {
210 
211  typedef InstanceData::unitTests_t unitTests_t;
212 
213  using std::setprecision;
214 
215  Time overallTimer("overallTimer", true);
216  Time timer("timer");
217 
218  const int timerPrec = 3;
219 
220  out << "\n***\n*** Unit test suite ...\n***\n\n";
221 
222  InstanceData &data = getData();
223 
224  const bool showAll = data.showTestDetails == SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_ALL;
225  const bool showTestNames = data.showTestDetails == SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_TEST_NAMES || showAll;
226 
227  showTestFailureLocation(data.showFailSrcLocation);
228 
229  bool success = true;
230  int testCounter = 0;
231  int numTestsRun = 0;
232  int numTestsFailed = 0;
233 
234  Array<std::string> failedTests;
235 
236  try {
237 
238  out << "\nSorting tests by group name then by the order they were added ...";
239  timer.start(true);
240  std::sort( data.unitTests.begin(), data.unitTests.end() );
241  timer.stop();
242  out << " (time = "<<setprecision(timerPrec)<<timer.totalElapsedTime()<<")\n";
243 
244  out << "\nRunning unit tests ...\n\n";
245  unitTests_t::iterator iter = data.unitTests.begin();
246  for ( ; iter != data.unitTests.end(); ++iter, ++testCounter ) {
247 
248  const UnitTestData &utd = (*iter);
249 
250  const std::string unitTestName = getUnitTestName(utd.groupName, utd.testName);
251 
252  if (
253  (
254  strMatch(data.groupName, utd.groupName)
255  &&
256  strMatch(data.testName, utd.testName)
257  )
258  &&
259  (
260  data.notUnitTestName.length() == 0
261  ||
262  !strMatch(data.notUnitTestName, unitTestName)
263  )
264  )
265  {
266 
267  ++numTestsRun;
268 
269  std::ostringstream testHeaderOSS;
270  testHeaderOSS <<testCounter<<". "<<unitTestName<<" ... ";
271  const std::string testHeader = testHeaderOSS.str();
272 
273  if (showAll)
274  out <<"\n";
275 
276  if (showTestNames)
277  out <<testHeader<<std::flush;
278 
279  {
280 
281  RCP<std::ostringstream> oss;
282  RCP<FancyOStream> localOut;
283  if (showAll) {
284  out << "\n";
285  localOut = rcpFromRef(out);
286  }
287  else {
288  oss = rcp(new std::ostringstream);
289  localOut = fancyOStream(rcp_implicit_cast<std::ostream>(oss));
290  }
291 
292  OSTab tab(out);
293 
294  if (!data.noOp) {
295 
296  timer.start(true);
297  const bool result = utd.unitTest->runUnitTest(*localOut);
298  timer.stop();
299 
300  if (!result) {
301 
302  failedTests.push_back(testHeader);
303 
304  if (!showTestNames)
305  out <<testHeader<<"\n"<<std::flush;
306  else if (!showAll)
307  out <<"\n";
308 
309  if (!is_null(oss))
310  out << oss->str();
311 
312  out
313  <<"[FAILED] "
314  <<" "<<setprecision(timerPrec)<<"("<<timer.totalElapsedTime()<< " sec)"
315  <<" "<<unitTestName<<"\n"
316  <<"Location: "<<utd.unitTest->unitTestFile()<<":"
317  <<utd.unitTest->unitTestFileLineNumber()<<"\n";
318 
319  if (!is_null(oss))
320  out << "\n";
321 
322  success = false;
323 
324  ++numTestsFailed;
325 
326  }
327  else {
328 
329  if (showTestNames)
330  out << "[Passed] "
331  << setprecision(timerPrec)<<"("<<timer.totalElapsedTime()<<" sec)\n";
332 
333  if (showAll && data.showSrcLocation)
334  out
335  << "Location: "<<utd.unitTest->unitTestFile()<<":"
336  <<utd.unitTest->unitTestFileLineNumber()<<"\n";
337 
338  }
339 
340  }
341  else {
342 
343  if (showTestNames)
344  out << "[Not Run]\n";
345 
346  }
347 
348  }
349 
350  }
351 
352  }
353 
354  TEUCHOS_ASSERT_EQUALITY(testCounter, as<int>(data.unitTests.size()));
355 
356  }
357  TEUCHOS_STANDARD_CATCH_STATEMENTS(true, out, success);
358 
359  if (failedTests.size()) {
360  out << "\nThe following tests FAILED:\n";
361  for (Teuchos_Ordinal i = 0; i < failedTests.size(); ++i)
362  out << " " << failedTests[i] << "\n";
363  }
364 
365  overallTimer.stop();
366  out << "\nTotal Time: " << setprecision(timerPrec)
367  << overallTimer.totalElapsedTime() << " sec\n";
368 
369  out
370  << "\nSummary: total = " << testCounter
371  << ", run = " << numTestsRun;
372 
373  if (!data.noOp) {
374  out
375  << ", passed = " << (numTestsRun-numTestsFailed)
376  << ", failed = " << numTestsFailed << "\n";
377  }
378  else {
379  out
380  << ", passed = ???"
381  << ", failed = ???\n";
382  }
383 
384  return success;
385 
386 }
387 
388 
389 int UnitTestRepository::runUnitTestsFromMain( int argc, char* argv[] )
390 {
391 
392  const RCP<FancyOStream> out = VerboseObjectBase::getDefaultOStream();
393 
394  CommandLineProcessor &clp = getData().clp;
395  setUpCLP(outArg(clp));
396  CommandLineProcessor::EParseCommandLineReturn parse_return =
397  clp.parse(argc,argv);
398  if ( parse_return != CommandLineProcessor::PARSE_SUCCESSFUL ) {
399  *out << "\nEnd Result: TEST FAILED" << std::endl;
400  return parse_return;
401  }
402 
403  const bool success = runUnitTests(*out);
404 
405  if (success)
406  *out << "\nEnd Result: TEST PASSED" << std::endl;
407  else
408  *out << "\nEnd Result: TEST FAILED" << std::endl;
409 
410  clp.printFinalTimerSummary(out.ptr());
411 
412  return (success ? 0 : 1);
413 
414 }
415 
416 
417 void UnitTestRepository::addUnitTest( UnitTestBase *unitTest,
418  const std::string groupName, const std::string testName_in )
419 {
420  InstanceData &data = getData();
421  std::string testName = testName_in;
422  data.unitTests.push_back(UnitTestData(unitTest, groupName, testName));
423 }
424 
425 
426 bool UnitTestRepository::verboseUnitTests()
427 {
428  return (getData().showTestDetails == SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_ALL);
429 }

432 // private:

435 UnitTestRepository::UnitTestRepository()
436 {}
437 
438 
439 void UnitTestRepository::setUpCLP(const Ptr<CommandLineProcessor>& clp)
440 {
441 
442  clp->addOutputSetupOptions(true);
443 
444  const int numShowTestDetails = 3;
445  const EShowTestDetails showTestDetailsValues[numShowTestDetails] =
446  { SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_ALL,
447  SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_TEST_NAMES,
448  SHOW_TEST_DETAILS_FINAL_RESULTS
449  };
450  const char* showTestDetailsNames[numShowTestDetails] =
451  { "ALL",
452  "TEST_NAMES",
453  "FINAL_RESULTS"
454  };
455  clp->setOption(
456  "show-test-details", &getData().showTestDetails,
457  numShowTestDetails, showTestDetailsValues, showTestDetailsNames,
458  "Level of detail to show in the tests"
459  );
460  clp->setOption(
461  "details", &getData().showTestDetails,
462  numShowTestDetails, showTestDetailsValues, showTestDetailsNames,
463  "Short for --show-test-details"
464  );
465 
466  clp->setOption(
467  "show-src-location", "no-show-src-location", &getData().showSrcLocation,
468  "If true, then the location of the unit test source code is shown."
469  " Only meaningfull if --show-test-details=ALL."
470  );
471 
472  clp->setOption(
473  "show-fail-src-location", "no-show-fail-src-location", &getData().showFailSrcLocation,
474  "If true, then the location of every failed unit test check is printed."
475  );
476 
477  clp->setOption(
478  "group-name", &getData().groupName,
479  "If specified, selects only tests that match the group name glob." );
480  clp->setOption(
481  "group", &getData().groupName,
482  "Short for --group-name." );
483 
484  clp->setOption(
485  "test-name", &getData().testName,
486  "If specified, selects only tests that match the test name glob." );
487  clp->setOption(
488  "test", &getData().testName,
489  "Short for --test-name." );
490 
491  clp->setOption(
492  "not-unit-test", &getData().notUnitTestName,
493  "If specified, full unit tests with glob matches will *not* be run." );
494 
495  clp->setOption(
496  "no-op", "do-op", &getData().noOp,
497  "If --no-op, then only the names of the tests that would be run are run."
498  );
499 
500 }
501 
502 
503 UnitTestRepository::InstanceData& UnitTestRepository::getData()
504 {
505  static UnitTestRepository::InstanceData data;
506  return data;
507 }
